products.title: Emi, Chintz - Roman Blind
products.description: Guaranteed to add floral charm and elegant finesse to a sophisticated dcor, the emi in chintz is made from a relaxed, linen-like fabric, flaunting sweetly designed, blossoming branches in a subtle palette of cream and oatmeal, with quick bursts of cerise. Transform a neutrally toned dining area into a welcoming and stylish haven by adding a delightful print and gentle flurries of colour. Stick to a biscuit or ivory base, adding mocha, cream, and latte tones for an overall soothing ambience, and include cherry red accessories for a coordinated finish.

products.title: Renaissance Faux Silk Blush Pink Roman Blind
products.description: Softness oozes through this renaissance faux silk blush pink roman blind in every way possible. There's the gentle palette of neutral, white and serene pink, and the luscious faux silk fabric that fills a room with endless luxury. The pattern is quite dainty too, an inky painter softness oozes through this renaissance faux silk blush pink roman blind in every way possible.

products.title: Paeonia Velvet Rose Roman Blind
products.description: How romantic. Weve taken the paeonia rose roman blind and dressed it with a sumptuous velvet fabric. Its just heavenly. From the texture to the pattern, we simply adore this design. The pattern is a complex one too, depicting a beautiful watercolour painting, with blooming how romantic.

products.title: Paeonia Rose Roman Blind
products.description: Who said art had to be hung on a wall, framed and untouched? We say bring it to a soft fabric, let it frame your window and be loved by all who see it. This is exactly what the faux suede collection offers, and with the pastel pink edition, you also get a pretty, kitsch colouring to invoke a light and airy feel to any room. The sweet pastel pink will work well when contrasted with bolder, deeper shades in coordinating colours, such as aubergine, fuschia, or tropical pink.

products.title: Sayuri, Chintz - Roman Blind
products.description: The attractive yet functional sayuri in chintz somehow combines both contemporary and traditional looks. The clean colours and the blank canvas have a modern look, whilst the florals are classically styled, resulting in a roman blind that will appeal across the generations. Settle the chinz into your kitchen, amongst matching cream units and natural woods. Use your tablecloth and seat cushions to pull out the dusky, vintage pink and primrose yellow in the blind, and continue this theme across the room.

products.title: Finch Toile, Rose - Roman Blind
products.description: In rose pink, soft charcoal grey, and ice white tones, the finch toile rose displays a toile pattern of birds and blossoms, drawn intricately on a dappled background. Made from a high quality cotton fabric, the material sits neatly into the romantic folds of the roman blind. The romantic rose is the perfect fit for a master bedroom where, set against barely there pink walls, matching greys, and accenting whites, it will sit pretty and turn the room into somewhere you'll relish waking up.

products.title: Dotty, Rose - Roman Blind
products.description: The delightful dusky pink base to the dotty rose blind is both attractive and charismatic, whilst the nimble and graceful cloth adds a casual and relaxed feel. Complete a refined and pretty look by incorporating this charming polka dot into your home. Form an inviting and attractive kitchen by adding subtle shades of colour and delicate patterns, combining with seafoam green, cornflower blue, and gentle lavender for a kitsch-inspired colour scheme, and glossy white furnishings for a refined and classy finish.

products.description: The bright and refreshing light blue of the flamingos in aqua is perfect for brightening up any home. Sweet flamingos, gently drawn in ice whites and candy pinks, skim the water and add colour to this delightful blind. The most obvious place for this water-themed roman blind would be in the bathroom, where it will look stunning against bright white tiles and blue accessories, but a fun alternative might be the guest bedroom, where you can accessorise with varying shades of sky blue and the occasional soft pink too.

products.description: The muted blues and soft salmon pinks in the flamingos sand merge with the sandy beige base to create a truly stunning aesthetic. The flamingos are beautifully drawn, sitting pretty against their softly sketched background. Turn the sand into a sensational piece of artwork by hanging it in the master bedroom, where surrounding it with similarly toned shades of blue and coral will pull out the colours of the blind wonderfully.

products.title: Flamingos, Pink - Roman Blind
products.description: Adorned in palest pinks and pretty greys, flamingos pink has a somewhat retro vibe to it, making it the ideal addition to give a contemporary home a little edge. The cotton fabric is high quality and folds neatly into the gentle pleats of the roman blind. Add the pink to the bathroom for an unusual yet appealing look, matching with stone greys and the occasional fuchsia. Alternatively, use it as a feature in a main or guest bedroom, opting for barely there grey walls and baby pink bedding.

products.title: Vw Campervan, Pink - Roman Blind
products.description: Cute and characterful, the vw campervan pink is a charming roman blind, featuring a creamy oatmeal background adorned with fun imagery of campervans in varying colours, with pink as the feature colour. The pink would charm guests in your spare bedroom. Keep the room feeling light and airy, adding in splashes of pink for a real colour pop. If you really love these iconic vehicles, consider a retro wall print to really bring the theme to life.

products.title: Amelie, Tearose - Roman Blind
products.description: Perhaps the most vibrant of the rustic amelie range, the pretty tearose is filled with wispy florals in tropical fuschia, pale coral, and soft grey. The grainy, dark cream backdrop, combined with the hessian-like cloth, adds to the vivid country style of this blind. Embrace a rural and romantic vibe in the master bedroom, using the sweet tearose as your base. Paint the walls in soft cream or baby pink, using chunky wooden furniture with a polished finish.

products.title: Amelie, Primrose - Roman Blind
products.description: The amelie in primrose incorporates a delightfully cheerful lemon yellow and a range of wild leafy greens, anchored to a hessian-style background in oatmeal. The end result is a wild country chic, tempered only by the structured cut of the gorgeous roman style. Ditch the traditional turquoise and go for a balmy lemon colour scheme in your bathroom instead. Plump for rustic wooden floors, a roll-top bath, and yellow and cream tiling, choosing towels and bathmats in chalky sage.

products.title: Birds And Roses Multi Roman Blind
